alert.note: Alert for Ballard; Carlisle; Fulton; Graves; Hickman; McCracken (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 08 at 11:51PM EDT until May 09 at 12:45AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Pulaski County in southern Illinois... Fulton County in western Kentucky... Carlisle County in western Kentucky... Hickman County in western Kentucky... Ballard County in western Kentucky... Western McCracken County in western Kentucky... Southwestern Graves County in western Kentucky... Mississippi County in southeastern Missouri... East central New Madrid County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1051 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Tamms to near Big Oak Tree State Park to near Tiptonville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fulton, Hickman, Clinton, La Center, Bardwell, Wickliffe, Towosahgy State Historic Site, Big Oak Tree State Park, Mounds, Barlow, Tamms, Mound City, Karnak, Wyatt, Cayce, Dorena, Fulgham, Lovelaceville, Ullin and Kevil. This includes the following highways... Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 4 and 21. Interstate 57 in Missouri between Mile Markers 17 and 21. Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 1 and 8. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Ballard; Carlisle; Fulton; Graves; Hickman; McCracken
